document.full_text: a year after the suppression of anti-government protests in bangkok, no official has been charged with a crime related to the deaths of about 90 people, human rights watch said.
document.title: rights group urges prosecutions in thai violence
lines_and_colors: a year after the suppression of anti-government protests in bangkok, no official has been charged with a crime related to the deaths of about 90 people, human rights watch said.
